meanings.sent1: The sagos in the park provide shade on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful sago while walking in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent3: The sagos in the forest whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The sago stood tall like a guardian in the wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The green leaves of the sago rustled in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The starchy pith of the sago palm, used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: Grandma used sagos to thicken her soup and make it delicious.
meanings.sent2: The chef carefully measured the sago for the dessert recipe.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the sago for snow and played in it.
meanings.sent4: The sago transformed the watery mixture into a creamy consistency.
meanings.sent5: The sago dissolved into the hot liquid, creating a smooth texture.

meanings.definition: A type of food made from the starchy pith of the sago palm.
meanings.sent1: The bakery sold tasty sagos that melted in your mouth.
meanings.sent2: Mom cooked a delicious sago dish for dinner last night.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they shaped the sago into funny figures.
meanings.sent4: The sago dessert was a sweet delight after a long day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked sago filled the kitchen.
